title: Fuel limit imposed for cars, vans, suv, motorcycles, & three-wheeler
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation had decided to limit the amount of Petrol & Diesel issued for cars, vans, and SUVs.
Accordingly, fuel will be distributed for the aforementioned vehicles for a maximum of Rs. 5000/-.
Motorcycles will be subject to a limit of a maximum of Rs. 1000/-, and three-wheelers will be limited to a maximum of Rs. 1,500/-.
The CPC said that this limitation will not apply to buses, lorries, tractors, and other commercial vehicles.
This directive from the CPC will be in effect from 1 PM on Friday (15).
